description:
Your weed solution for every weed problem

Get rid of weeds anywhere in your yard with this comprehensive kit.

This kit gives you everything you need to tackle any weed situation. Use Dandelion Doom in your lawn to kill weeds without harming grass, and Weed Warrior for garden beds and hardscapes. Each product comes in both ready-to-use spray bottles for immediate spot treatments and concentrates with sprayers for larger areas. This means you're prepared for both quick touch-ups and serious weed problems without needing multiple products or equipment.

sections.product_features:
Complete lawn and garden weed control
Ready-to-use sprays for immediate spot treatment
Concentrates with sprayers for larger weed problems
Lawn-safe formula for broadleaf weeds
Fast-acting organic solution for gardens and hardscapes
Visible results in as little as 20 minutes
No harsh chemicals
sections.whats_included:
Dandelion Doom: One 32 oz. ready-to-use spray bottle and one 5 oz. concentrate bottle
Weed Warrior: One 32 oz. ready-to-use spray bottle and one 27 oz. concentrate bottle
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply between 50-85 degrees F when no rain is expected for 3+ hours:
For concentrate application: Mix the concentrate into the respective herbicide pouch and attach the wand sprayer
For ready-to-use application: Shake bottles well before using and adjust nozzle to desired spray pattern
Apply directly on weeds until leaves are entirely covered
Allow products to dry completely before any foot or pet traffic
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What's the difference between Dandelion Doom and Weed Warrior?
Dandelion Doom is selective - it kills broadleaf weeds while leaving grass unharmed, making it perfect for lawn use. Weed Warrior is non-selective - it kills all vegetation it contacts including grass, making it ideal for hardscapes and garden beds.
What weeds do these products control?
Dandelion Doom controls broadleaf weeds like dandelions, clover, chickweed, plantain, thistle, and creeping charlie. It also helps suppress lawn diseases.
Weed Warrior controls annual bluegrass, chickweed, crabgrass, dandelion, thistle, moss, algae and many other vegetation types.
When is the best time to apply these products?
Apply when weeds are actively growing in moderate temperatures between 50-85°F. Avoid applying if rain is expected within 3 hours, as this can wash away the product before it's fully absorbed.
Can I use Weed Warrior on my lawn?
Use Weed Warrior carefully on lawns as it will kill all vegetation it contacts, including grass. For selective weed control in lawns, use Dandelion Doom which targets weeds while leaving grass unharmed.
How quickly will I see results?
Weed Warrior can show results in as little as 20 minutes. Dandelion Doom typically shows results within hours, with complete control in 1-2 days.
Are there any US states where this is not approved for use?
This product is approved for use in all states.
